an5.62:1.1: “Pancima, bhikkhave, sanna bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana.
an5.62:1.3: Aniccasanna, anattasanna, maranasanna, ahare patikulasanna, sabbaloke anabhiratasanna—
an5.62:1.4: ima kho, bhikkhave, panca sanna bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana”ti.
